overview_of_class: Introduction to Physical Geology: The study of Earth materials and the physical, chemical and biological processes that shape the planet. Topics include minerals; sedimentary, igneous, and metamorphic rocks; the interior Earth, oceans, and atmosphere; solid Earth processes, such as volcanism, seismicity, and plate tectonics and their interactions with the atmosphere and hydrosphere to drive surface Earth processes, such as climate, weathering, and glaciation; geologic time; global change.
name: Earth Systems Revealed
title: WCAS EARTH 201-0-01 Earth Systems Revealed
